summary: Mobile-first romantic premium birthday website with password gate, animated hero/popup, looping background music, and interactive image/video memory sections with flip/rotate surprise messages and user media upload/replace.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive single-page romantic birthday site.
Password gate required before showing main content.
Requires support for local media selection (phone gallery) for images/videos and replacing existing items.
Interactive 3D flip/rotate card UI with front image and back text; per-card editing (drag-to-adjust/crop positioning + save).
Continuous looping background audio (MP3) with autoplay considerations on mobile.
Image Memory cards should enforce a consistent 2:3 aspect ratio for the image/tile layout.
